QuestData.Title: That Smart One's Gotta Go
QuestData.Description: There's some kind of smart brain bug in the back of the cave. It's in charge of all of the silithid down there.$B$BMy ice cream is melting! How am I supposed to launch my ice cream empire, and save my inventory, if that thing's in there?!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Slay it for the future prosperity of the Ice Cream Empire!
QuestData.CompletionText: $n! Get down there and kill that thing!
QuestData.RewardText: Outstanding! Nothing can stop us from being the greatest purveyors of ice cream in all of Azeroth!
